localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.title:
Global Central Bank Update:
-Russia hikes rates for the 3rd time this year, 50 bps increase to 5.50%. https://t.co/Z6eUOKCKFN
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
